attributes.action: Sia security guards should get payed minimum of £10.00 per hour
attributes.additional_details: A SIA security guard should be earning a minumum of £10.00 per hour, due to the risks. Preventing security issues is one of the most important goals for a security guard because they play a defensive role. Security guards have a role to maintain the safety of the public and to keep everyone and the business/property secure. The guards put they lives at risk everyday to keep everyone else safe
attributes.background: A SIA security guard should be earning a minumum of £10.00per hour due to the risks.A guard plays a very important and defensive role. Security guards have a role to maintain the safety of the public and to keep everyone and the business secure.The guards put they lives at risk to keep everyone safe
